Action.author: c0rwin
Action.body: ~gennadyl Is this going to be available for v1.3?

Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: ~C0rWin I think I will move it to next version

Action.author: denyeart
Action.body: ~gennadyl Is this still needed given the other java chaincode programming model work?

Action.author: c0rwin
Action.body: Since new programing model is going to change the interaction and the way chaincode is developed, I would like to defer this one to the next release (not to include within v2.0)

Action.author: gennadyl
Action.body: I prefer to close it - it will be covered by new programming model.
